jd: From: Ben Clark, Tech Talent Connect LLC ben@techtalentconnect.com Reply to: ben@techtalentconnect.com Please don't submit profiles below 13 years. client is looking for senior profiles with prior lead experience. Job Title: .NET Application Developer Location: San Antonio, TX (Onsite)Duration: 12+ monthsClient: Capital GroupExp: 13+ Rate: $62 - $65 (Max)Need profiles matching with the below criteria:(Mandatory*)1. WPF experience2. Prior Lead experience3. Strong with.NET full stack experience4. at least 3 years US experience Qualifications:* Minimum 13 years of experience in business systems analysis, application development, and testing.* Experience developing web-based applications in C#, HTML, JavaScript, ASP.NET MVC, and ASP.NET Core.* Expert full-stack development skills with n-tier applications utilizing the following technologies: C#,.Net, MVVM, Microsoft WPF, IIS, SQL Server, LINQ, and Web API.* Design, Develop, and Maintain High-Quality Software Applications Using C#,.NET Core, and Azure Services.* Strong experience leveraging design patterns, including MVVM.* Strong experience in Production Support L3 role, Handling incidents, Tasks, and Problem management.* Experience in using Monitoring and log-capturing tools like Dynatrace, Zabbix, Splunk, etc.Responsibilities:* Leads and personally contributes to solution delivery through SDLC activities (analysis, development, testing, deployment, support, etc.) for one or more medium- to high-complexity business capabilities and/or products.* Demonstrates thought leadership and deep understanding through analysis and improvement recommendations to multifaceted business processes, application features, and data change to resolve defects or enhance business capabilities.Required Skills:C#,.NET Framework 4.8,.NET 6 (Standard), Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), Production Support. Tools & Technology:ServiceNow, Jira, Bitbucket, Visual Studio, qTest, Jenkins, Confluence, Bamboo.
